"This is just great. Not only do Sora and I get lost, but now I've lost Sora," grumbled Biyomon as she walked down a long row of machinery, desperatly trying to find her way back to the group. Only a few minutes ago, Biyomon and the rest of the digidestind had stumbled upon Andromon, an android type digimon, stuck in a wall of gears. Unable to pull him out on their own, several members of the group had split up to try and find a way to get him out.

Due to the size of the factory and their lack of knowledge about it, Biyomon and her digidestined, Sora, had soon found themselves lost. A few minutes after that, Biyomon had found herself alone, Sora nowhere to be seen. And so here she was, lost and alone and frantically trying to get her bearings so she could find her way back to the group.

"When that walking bucket of bolts wakes up, first thing I'm going to do is demand he draw a map for this place," she grumbled, seeing a doorway up ahead. Hoping it might lead her back to the group, or at least lead someplace that would help her, she rushed up to the door and opened it.

"What is this place," she said upon stepping in. She was in an even larger area of the factory which was even more cluttered with machinery, except it was different from what she had seen so far. Conveyor belts were everywhere, surrounded by long mechanical arms ending in tube and gripping claws. In other places, big bags were attached to pumps, held by bars that seemed designed to push and pull the bags back and forth.

"What is this place?" she squawked, her curiosity getting the better of her as she entered the room.

Though a little nervous about what was on the other side of that chute, Gatomon was quite distracted by the sight below her as she watched her friends from above, watched them grow bigger, and bigger, their features disappearing into their rounding bodies.

Biyomon and Palmon cooed and giggled as they reached six feet, their heads sinking into their bodies as they became completely round. Sora cooed and moaned, wiggling her fingers and toes helplessly as she wished somebody could rub her watermelon-sized boobs. Kari giggled and purred to herself, her mind already gone again. "Bigger! Bigger! Bigger!" she chanted in her mind. Mimi shuddered as arousal began to grow for her as her boobs took more helium than Sora or Kari's, growing to the size of beachballs.

After several more minutes, there was a succession of dings as each friend hit ten feet and were released into the air. Kari whooped as she floated up, her boobs about the size of Sora's, though she wished she could have grown bigger. Mimi gasped in some alarm as she was released, and the others gawked at her; she was ten feet wide, like all of them, but her hands and feet had been fully absorbed, leaving only her head and boobs- however, her boobs were each at least three feet wide.

"Wow, Mimi!" Sora exclaimed. "Nice job!"

"T-thanks!" Mimi stammered, still trying to adjust to her new shape and helplessness.

"Are you okay?" Palmon asked anxiously.

"I'm fine!" Mimi assured her.

"This is awesome!" Kari exclaimed, which caused everyone to laugh.

Looking down, they could see the digimon workers inflating regular balloons again, some of them floating up, some of them popping. Soon, the ballooned Digi-Destined and their companions reached the chute. Gatomon yelped as she was sucked in, and each of the other girls were sucked in as well, tumbling and bouncing along its metal corridor to their next destination.

info.description:
While in the factory where our heroes discovered Andromon, Biyomon ends up getting separated from the group. Her attempts to return to her friends leads her to a section of the factory that seems geared towards the creation of balloons. However, she will soon discover just where these balloons come from.

To allow for a larger character selection, this story inculdes the digidestined from both Season 1 and 2 and their respective digimon. This is mainly a digimon inflation focused story, so please keep human inflation to a minimum. Both female and male inflation is allowed. Again, this is a mainly a gas related inflation story, so please no blueberries or wg; liquid inflation is allowed though. No scat, watersports, rape, etc.

While this is an adult story and adult situation are allowed, please do not go overboard. Keep it mild and tame (no orgies, overly graphic descriptions, etc). Also, please use correct spelling and grammar. I won't delete any chapters, but I reserve the right to edit them if necesarry.

Above all, have fun and enjoy the ballooning.
